  16. #ifndef CAML_BIGARRAY_H
  17. ‌#define CAML_BIGARRAY_H

  19. #include "config.h"
  20. #include "mlvalues.h"

  22. ‌typedef signed char caml_ba_int8;
  23. ‌typedef unsigned char caml_ba_uint8;
  24. #if defined(HAS_STDINT_H)
  25. ‌typedef int16_t caml_ba_int16;
  26. ‌typedef uint16_t caml_ba_uint16;
  27. #elif SIZEOF_SHORT == 2
  28. ‌typedef short caml_ba_int16;
  29. ‌typedef unsigned short caml_ba_uint16;
  30. #else
  31. #error "No 16-bit integer type available"
  32. #endif

  34. ‌#define CAML_BA_MAX_NUM_DIMS 16

  36. ‌enum caml_ba_kind {
  37.   CAML_BA_FLOAT32,             /* Single-precision floats */
  38.   CAML_BA_FLOAT64,             /* Double-precision floats */
  39.   CAML_BA_SINT8,               /* Signed 8-bit integers */
  40.   CAML_BA_UINT8,               /* Unsigned 8-bit integers */
  41.   CAML_BA_SINT16,              /* Signed 16-bit integers */
  42.   CAML_BA_UINT16,              /* Unsigned 16-bit integers */
  43.   CAML_BA_INT32,               /* Signed 32-bit integers */
  44.   CAML_BA_INT64,               /* Signed 64-bit integers */
  45.   CAML_BA_CAML_INT,            /* OCaml-style integers (signed 31 or 63 bits) */
  46.   CAML_BA_NATIVE_INT,       /* Platform-native long integers (32 or 64 bits) */
  47.   CAML_BA_COMPLEX32,           /* Single-precision complex */
  48.   CAML_BA_COMPLEX64,           /* Double-precision complex */
  49.   CAML_BA_CHAR,                /* Characters */
  50.   CAML_BA_KIND_MASK = 0xFF     /* Mask for kind in flags field */
  51. };

  53. ‌#define Caml_ba_kind_val(v) Int_val(v)

  55. ‌#define Val_caml_ba_kind(k) Val_int(k)

  57. ‌enum caml_ba_layout {
  58.   CAML_BA_C_LAYOUT = 0,           /* Row major, indices start at 0 */
  59.   CAML_BA_FORTRAN_LAYOUT = 0x100, /* Column major, indices start at 1 */
  60.   CAML_BA_LAYOUT_MASK = 0x100,    /* Mask for layout in flags field */
  61.   CAML_BA_LAYOUT_SHIFT = 8        /* Bit offset of layout flag */
  62. };

  64. ‌#define Caml_ba_layout_val(v) (Int_val(v) << CAML_BA_LAYOUT_SHIFT)

  66. ‌#define Val_caml_ba_layout(l) Val_int(l >> CAML_BA_LAYOUT_SHIFT)

  68. ‌enum caml_ba_managed {
  69.   CAML_BA_EXTERNAL = 0,        /* Data is not allocated by OCaml */
  70.   CAML_BA_MANAGED = 0x200,     /* Data is allocated by OCaml */
  71.   CAML_BA_MAPPED_FILE = 0x400, /* Data is a memory mapped file */
  72.   CAML_BA_MANAGED_MASK = 0x600 /* Mask for "managed" bits in flags field */
  73. };

  75. ‌struct caml_ba_proxy {
  76.   atomic_uintnat refcount;      /* Reference count */
  77.   void * data;                  /* Pointer to base of actual data */
  78.   uintnat size;                 /* Size of data in bytes (if mapped file) */
  79. };

  81. ‌struct caml_ba_array {
  82.   void * data;                /* Pointer to raw data */
  83.   intnat num_dims;            /* Number of dimensions */
  84.   intnat flags;  /* Kind of element array + memory layout + allocation status */
  85.   struct caml_ba_proxy * proxy; /* The proxy for sub-arrays, or NULL */
  86.   /* PR#5516: use C99's flexible array types if possible */
  87. #if (__STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L)
  88.   intnat dim[]  /*[num_dims]*/; /* Size in each dimension */
  89. #else
  90.   intnat dim[1] /*[num_dims]*/; /* Size in each dimension */
  91. #endif
  92. };

  94. /* Size of struct caml_ba_array, in bytes, without dummy first dimension */
  95. #if (__STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L)
  96. ‌#define SIZEOF_BA_ARRAY sizeof(struct caml_ba_array)
  97. #else
  98. ‌#define SIZEOF_BA_ARRAY (sizeof(struct caml_ba_array) - sizeof(intnat))
  99. #endif

  101. ‌#define Caml_ba_array_val(v) ((struct caml_ba_array *) Data_custom_val(v))

  103. ‌#define Caml_ba_data_val(v) (Caml_ba_array_val(v)->data)

  105. #ifdef __cplusplus
  106. extern "C" {
  107. #endif

  109. CAMLextern value
  110.     caml_ba_alloc(int flags, int num_dims, void * data, intnat * dim);
  111. CAMLextern value caml_ba_alloc_dims(int flags, int num_dims, void * data,
  112.                                  ... /*dimensions, with type intnat */);
  113. CAMLextern uintnat caml_ba_byte_size(struct caml_ba_array * b);
  114. CAMLextern uintnat caml_ba_num_elts(struct caml_ba_array * b);

  116. #ifdef __cplusplus
  117. }
  118. #endif
